casebody.data:
Mart Howe, as Administratrix, &c., Appellant v. John G. Semon, et al., Respondents. Decided May 7, 1888. Appeal .from judgment dismissing complaint. James A. Hudson, for appellant. Edmund Coffin, Jr., for respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and O’Gorman, JJ.

Per Curiam.

The judgment should he affirmed with costs.
